pages.text: I just like terracotta a lot. I used to not be a fan of it, but I’ve since grown past my comfort zone. I know a lot of other people dislike it as well because ‘the colors don’t look like what it says’. I get it, but if you look past that, you can end up with a bunch of cool blocks you never knew you had to work with! There are also terracotta walls, stairs and slabs!
